title: Restore after drive failure windows 11
content:
Windows 11 root drive failed. With new drive and fresh install I reloaded my email from back-up and all went well!

Of course I lost email between last back-up and drive failure (as expected). I have subsequently been able to recover data from the failed drive and I can see the data from the time between back-up and drive failure.

Is there any mechanism to merge those message back into my active mail storage?

Thunderbird version 115.12.2 (64 bit).
creator: terry120

title: crashed?
content: Is my e-mail down due to world wide problems with IT ?
creator: leroylooser
